title: Happy Birthday Frutiger!
content:
Adrian Frutiger turns 80 tomorrow!

Lets all give a warm congrats to this remarkable designer who, I'm sure, has influenced our work in some way or another.

[http://www.linotype.com/en/5367/participezlaclbrationdu80meanniversaired...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014235600/http:/www.linotype.com/en/5367/participezlaclbrationdu80meanniversairedadrianfrutiger.html "http://www.linotype.com/en/5367/participezlaclbrationdu80meanniversairedadrianfrutiger.html")
author: •Prakash Nair

comments.content: tomorrow ... not today? am I wrong?
A very Happy Birthday to you Adrian Frutiger!

Bon Anniversaire Adrian

(even if you will most probably never come across this website)

dr
What a wonderful person he is... all the best to him - I know he's feeling the love.

I'm a bit late but here it is!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY FRUTIGER!

<cite> I know he’s feeling the love </cite>

I hope so. :-)
